headline: Solventum Fluency for Imaging clinches top spot again: Ranked #1 Best in KLAS for Speech Recognition: Front-end Imaging
summary: Solventum (NYSE: SOLV) Solventum today announced that its AI-powered radiology speech reporting solution, Solventum™ Fluency™ for Imaging, has ranked #1 in the 2025 Best in KLAS Awards—Software and Services Report for the fifth time.
